description: GET /images/detail or GET /images/<id> should return an entity with a metadata property. Currently, it does not.
title: OSAPI: images metadata missing from /images/detail and /images/<id> calls

comments.content: GET /images/detail or GET /images/<id> should return an entity with a metadata property. Currently, it does not.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
